xwikidoc.title: Contact
xwikidoc.content: There are various ways you can get in touch with the PhenoTips team: (% style="width: 49%; float: left" %)((( ; {{icon name="question" size="large"/}}Ask for support: : [[##support@phenotips.org##>>mailto:support@phenotips.org]] ; {{icon name="bell" size="large"/}}Get the latest news: : [[##announcements@phenotips.org##>>http://mail.phenotips.org/mailman/listinfo/announcements]] ; {{icon name="twitter" size="large"/}}Follow us on twitter: : [[@phenotips>>https://twitter.com/phenotips]] )))(% style="width: 49%; float: left" %)((( ; {{icon name="comments" size="large"/}}Talk to us on IRC: : [[#phenotips on irc.freenode.net>>Contact.IRC]] ; (% class="external-link email"%)[[{{icon name="envelope" size="large"/}}Join our mailing lists:>>Contact.Mailing Lists]] : [[##devs@phenotips.org##>>http://mail.phenotips.org/mailman/listinfo/devs]] : [[##users@phenotips.org##>>http://mail.phenotips.org/mailman/listinfo/users]] : [[##notifications@phenotips.org##>>http://mail.phenotips.org/mailman/listinfo/notifications]] ))) (% class="clearfloats" %)((()))
